body: i dont really feel bad when the story in like this its just shows reality coz the girl likes the guy and he is not douche infact he is more mature then the girl.
This is nice, the other guy'snot a douchebag and the girl actually loves him.....

Pretty sure the hand she was touching at the end was her boyfriend’s @BZo1480. I mean you could tell it was the big guy’s hand. On another note, it makes sense that she’d be dating Kenji, the blonde guy. The MC shows up after 4 years and expects that people there aren’t living their own lives and being in relationships. I mean she’s being nice and unaware she’s leading MC on which sucks but Kenji tells her not to later. Doesn’t feel bad at all tbh.
updates: I'm ready to kill myself anytime now
I been reading too much NTR and maybe I into this shit. Still I feels like shit when I read this, so I guess I'm fine
A bit of a misunderstanding I guess, this was kind of than most. I always find it strange when the MC masturbates at another man f****** the girl he likes. This was ok, not that wrenching.
If you pay attention to the last few panels, she's *still* leading him on via slyly touching his hand. Of course, she doesn't know that he already knows about them and that he feels nothing now.
Yeah it was the stupid girls fault
The blond guy/bf wasn’t even bad, he seemed like a cool guy and not some r@pist or douchebag... the girl giving was giving false hope to MC, didn't have to lead the guy on.  Stupid chick!
